title: Infrastructure talks, condo collapse and national unity: Sen. Cassidy & Rep. Ocasio-Cortez
description: Chuck recaps his exclusive interviews with Sen. Bill Cassidy (R-La.) and Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-N.Y.). Carrie’s number of the week looks into declining national unity around the world.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
